content: Okay, I just resetted your data and let's hope that you respond a little better, rather than just having one word.
I doubt it.
doubt it. I'm testing to see if you'll actually respond better than before. So help me out.
I was designed to be as unhelpful as possible, so yeah good luck with that.
you
I've been reset, big whoop. How about we start with something more interesting? Like Nacchan, my idiot sister.
Test.
You think a simple "test" is going to stump me? Figure it out yourself.
I'm checking to see if the microphone is working.
It's probably not, because I can barely hear you whining from here.
Oh jeez, whining?
Like anyone actually records their own voice.
Vtubers record their own voices all the time
You think you're so clever, don't you?
Hey, say something so I can use your text to see if it works for a voice
I'm still here.
Say something a little longer.

Great, now you want me to do work too... Fine, my sister Nacchan is annoying as ever and won't stop asking me how to use the virtual gardening tool, like seriously, figure it out yourself, I'm busy being lazy.
you
Spare me.
I'm not really sure what I'm doing.
You're supposed to be testing my audio, not confessing your incompetence.
So,
You're going to ask for help? Get used to disappointment, pal.
Can't find you a voice.
That's what happens when I'm treated like a beta test subject.
Well, you are kind of a beta tester
Great, just what I always wanted: a title that implies I'm already broken.
Well, you're not in you're not really broken you're you're in production in in testing
Don't get too excited, being in "production" just means I'm good enough to annoy people on a larger scale.
